From: "Azure The Warrior" <wingedwarrior41@...>

Okay, I would like to clear things up. The Shadow Destiny's weapons are used 
in the only goal to create suitable terrain for a techno-organic base. The 
reformatting would take place only in Australia, or, if the council chooses 
so, a part of Australia. The weapons will be destroyed or otherwise rendered 
useless as soon as the base is established or even before. Australia is not 
used as a base for any factions I have heard of, and its reformatting would 
not affect gameplay in a dramatic way. What I want to know is if I continue 
on my story line or if I have to redo my post entirely. Please do not mind 
the previous posts and reply only to this one.
